questions.questionTitle: Who are the speakers talking about?
What does the man say about Benjamin?
What does Benjamin plan to do?

script:
� Martha, have you met Benjamin yet? He's our new summer intern from State University.
� No Scott, I haven't. I hope he's as good as the intern we had last summer. That young man worked really hard.
� Benjamin seems sharp. And he's ambitious too. He said after he gets his business degree, he wants to go to law school and become a criminal lawyer.
� Oh my. Maybe we'll see him on TV one day, defending a celebrity in a famous trial!
